intro.p: A professor wanted to learn more about the students at her university with regards to whether they prefer in-person or online classes. She randomly sent out surveys to students at the university, and {{sample}} students responded. Among these {{sample}} students, {{result}}% of them reported that they prefer taking online classes.

content.p: What is the population that this study is trying to get information about?

outtro.p: Students at the school where the professor works at
The {{sample}} students that responded to the survey.

content.p: What is the variable used for this study?

outtro.p: Do the student prefer in-person or on-line classes.

content.p: What type of variable is the variable in question 3?
What is the sample statistic for this study?

outtro.p: The sample statistic is {{result}}% of those polled, that prefer on-line classes.

content.p: What is the parameter of interest for this study? (the population parameter they are trying to gether information about)

outtro.p: The parameter of interest is what percentage of students prefer on-line classes.
